featured.text: After testing these brands on five different groups of live bedbugs for two hours, the scientists saw that the foggers had little—if any—effect on the insects.
Ohio State University researchers tested three commercially sold foggers in a study on the effect of foggers on bedbugs.
The researchers said bedbugs hide in cracks and crevices such as under sheets and mattresses, or deep in carpets where foggers won’t reach.
How do bedbugs react to foggers?

other.text: What does the author advise people to do with bedbug problems? (A) Choose the right fogger.
What is this passage mainly about? (A) Steps to get rid of bedbugs.

definition.zh_def: 床虱，一種小型的寄生昆蟲，通常棲息在床上和家具中，以人類和動物的血液為食。
definition.en_def: A small parasitic insect that typically lives in beds and furniture, feeding on the blood of humans and animals.
definition.example: I found a bedbug in my mattress, so I had to call an exterminator.
